FuncDef: The batch-task task-name-list command configures permissions for tasks in batches. The batch-task task-name-list command configures permissions for tasks in batches. By default, task permissions are not configured in batches.

ParaDef.Info:
Grants the read permission to users.
-

Grants the read-write permission to users.
-

Grants the diagnosis permission to users.
-

Indicates the name of a task group.
The value must be set according to the device configuration.

Examples: [*HUAWEI-aaa-task-group-1] batch-task read task-name-list interface-mgr aaa config
